about_the_game:
A total of 25 new tracks from GENESiS RE:BUiLD02, available now on AXTORM MUSIC, are added to MASH VP! Re:VISION. 10 new DLC songs alongside 15 new mash-up tracks for a total of 25 new tracks to play! 

This collection is filled with new songs from prominent artists from the music game scene, both old and new as well as across the globe!

When purchased, you will be able to play these new songs in “FREEPLAY” mode, and upon playing each song you will be able to play new tracks in “MASH UP” mode!

The following songs are added to “FREEPLAY” mode:

Black Diamond / ELEKTEL

Nocturnal Gale / HIROSHI WATANABE

DELTA / alleyy

Abandoned. / litmus*

Altered:Faker / Se-U-Ra

Say Goodbye / RiraN

Deeyat / Sobrem

交織のコード / Yamajet feat. Hiura Masako

恥骨の血 / AKIRA YAMAOKA

DistLuv/EmoCosine

Additionally, upon playing the songs above for the first time you will receive the following new tracks in “MASH UP” mode:

[DistLuv / EmoCosine] x [abandoned. / litmus*]

[Say Goodbye / RiraN] x [blood of pubic bone / AKIRA YAMAOKA]

[Black Diamond / ELEKTEL] x [Nocturnal Gale / HIROSHI WATANABE]

[LOVETOXIC addiction / NAOKI underground] x [Altered:Faker / Se-U-Ra]  

That’s a total of 15 new combinations added to “MASH UP” mode! 

With a total of 25 new tracks to play between both modes, the fun is exponentially greater!
